mapper.select: SELECT io.item_option_id, io.item_id, io.color_option_id, color_opt.value AS color_name, io.size_option_id, size_opt.value AS size_name, io.additional_price, io.created_at, io.updated_at, inv.quantity FROM item_option io LEFT JOIN `option` color_opt ON io.color_option_id = color_opt.option_id LEFT JOIN `option` size_opt ON io.size_option_id = size_opt.option_id LEFT JOIN inventory inv ON io.item_option_id = inv.item_option_id WHERE io.item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT DISTINCT o.option_id AS colorOptionId, o.value AS colorName FROM item_option io JOIN `option` o ON io.color_option_id = o.option_id WHERE io.item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT DISTINCT o.option_id AS sizeOptionId, o.value AS sizeName FROM item_option io JOIN `option` o ON io.size_option_id = o.option_id WHERE io.item_id = #{itemId}
